description: The Canadian Special Operations Regiment is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Electrical and Electronic products under the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HN-16ELEC. The bid is for Spectrum Analyzers as per the attached Annex A Equipment List.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal - Keysight Spectrum Analyzers

**Reference Number:** `cb-706-58246843`
**Solicitation Number:** `W6448-24-D050`
**Publication Date:** October 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 03, 2023, 12:00 PM (EST)

The Canadian Special Operations Regiment invites bids for the procurement of Keysight Spectrum Analyzers under the Supply Arrangement (SA) series `E60HN-16ELEC`. The contract is expected to commence on November 06, 2023, and conclude on March 29, 2024.

**Specification**

The requirement is for the following items:

| Part Number | Description | Quantity |
| --- | --- | --- |
| N9917B-N9917B | 18 GHz FieldFox Microwave Analyzer | 5 |
| N9917B-N9917B-010 | Vector Network Analyzer Time Domain | 5 |
| N9917B-N9917B-208 | USB Power Sensor Measurements versus Frequency | 5 |
| ... | ... | ... |

**Submission Requirements**

Bidders must submit their proposals no later than November 03, 2023. The lowest priced responsive bid on an aggregate basis will be recommended for contract award.

**Evaluation Criteria**

Proposals will be evaluated based on:

* Technical compliance to the requirement presented herein and at Annex A
* Technical compliance of equivalent (substitute) products offered
* Lowest Total Evaluated Bid Price

**Important Notes**

* All bidders must comply with the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement (SA) series `E60HN-16ELEC`
* The deadline for submission is November 03, 2023
* The successful bidder will be required to deliver the items to the Canadian Special Operations Regiment no later than March 31, 2024

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

Dean Hiscock
dean.hiscock@forces.gc.ca
(613) 687-5511

This notice is subject to the Application Data Requirements for Goods, Services and Construction (ADR for GSC) and the Trade Agreement Consolidation (TAC) requirements.
